title: Epidural dexmedetomidine or esketamine versus fentanyl to decrease ropivacaine use for labor analgesia: A randomized non-inferiority study
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Lifeng Ni, Shengjie Yao, Yahong Wu, Jianxin Ni, Qingtao Wang, Zhong Mei, Jing Yu
